name: Dapper Dasher Revamped
description:
Dapper Dasher Revamped

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Dapper Dasher is a 2D endless side-scrolling runner. You control Scarfy and try to avoid the Nebulae. The goal is to try and get the highest score you can.

Controls:

A = Left     D = Right     Space = Jump     P = Pause

  • Made for: raylib 5K gamejam
  • GitHub: Dapper-Dasher_Revamper
